title: MBMBaM 252: Face 2 Face: Sock Detectives
description: Here's our final live show from our Midwest tour from earlier this year, which took place Easter Sunday at the Athenaeum in beautiful Chicago, IL. Can you solve the sock mystery before TIME RUNS OUT?
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
